department.ch: 學務處-服務學習發展中心

goal.en: The course focuses on connecting the iron triangle of Taoyuan Military Village and constructing the knowledge of Taoyuan Military Village in a collaborative spirit. Through oral interviews and data surveys, the final micro-curation is carried out in Matsu New Village: a collaborative workshop method to allow more students to participate The translation of local literature and history, the practice of cultural citizen participation, deconstructs the previous top-down knowledge authority, and transforms it into a bottom-up and joint construction of military village knowledge. In addition, this class emphasizes cross-field learning, which is very suitable for leading students to carry out service learning activities based on subject characteristics.
goal.ch: 課程重點在串連桃園眷村鐵三角，以協作精神建構桃園眷村知識學，透過口述訪談及資料調查，最後期末在馬祖新村進行微策展：以協作工作坊方式，讓更多同學參與在地文史的轉譯，實踐文化公民參與，解構過往由上而下的知識權威，轉變為由下而上、共同建構眷村知識學。且本班強調跨領域的學習，很適合結合學科特色帶領同學進行服務學習活動。

content.en:
1-4 Collect information
5-8 Translation
9-12 Move-in
13-16 Matsu New Village Residential Area
